text.autoconfig.survivality.title: Survivality Config
text.autoconfig.survivality.option.safeC: Cactus blocks don't destroy Cactus items
text.autoconfig.survivality.option.feath: Feather Falling boots don't trample farmland
text.autoconfig.survivality.option.unsta: Pointed Dripstone falls when hit by projectiles
text.autoconfig.survivality.option.bette: Night Vision is affected by its amplifier
text.autoconfig.survivality.option.maxNi: Max amount Night Vision can affect brightness
text.autoconfig.survivality.option.tride: Drop rate of Tridents from Drowned
text.autoconfig.survivality.option.eyeOf: Chance for Eyes of Enders to break
text.autoconfig.survivality.option.zombi: Horses struck by lightning become Zombie Horses
text.autoconfig.survivality.option.playe: Amount of xp to drop on death
text.autoconfig.survivality.option.color: Sheep can rarely spawn with any color wool
text.autoconfig.survivality.option.maxSl: Max size a Slime can spawn as
text.autoconfig.survivality.option.maxMa: Max size a Magma Cube can spawn as
text.autoconfig.survivality.option.armor: Armor in the hotbar can be swapped with equipped armor
text.autoconfig.survivality.option.moreS: Cookies, Sweet Berries, and Glow Berries are eaten faster
text.autoconfig.survivality.option.shove: Snow Layers can be decreased with Shovels
text.autoconfig.survivality.option.varia: Spawners are affected by the biome they generate in
text.autoconfig.survivality.option.rando: Freshly generated worlds can start at any time
Freshly generated worlds can start with any weather
Freshly generated worlds can start with a random position
Freshly generated worlds can start in any biome
text.autoconfig.survivality.option.rocke: Rockets boost vehicles and ridden mobs
- Boats can be boosted in water
- Minecarts can be boosted on rails
text.autoconfig.survivality.option.allow: Vehicles can be boosted on land
text.autoconfig.survivality.option.spawn: Default range for players to activate spawners
text.autoconfig.survivality.option.unres: Spawners will spawn regardless of how many mobs are nearby
